title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: Leading the frontend development team in building modern web applications with React and Next.js. Responsible for architecture decisions, code reviews, and mentoring junior developers.
responsibilities: Lead frontend architecture and design decisions
Collaborate with UX/UI designers and backend developers
Optimize application performance and user experience
Implement modern development practices and workflows
achievements: Improved application performance by 40% through code splitting and optimization
Led migration from legacy React class components to modern hooks
Established comprehensive testing practices increasing code coverage to 90%
Mentored 5 junior developers who were promoted within the team

title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Developed full-stack applications using MERN stack. Focused on building scalable web applications and improving system performance through various optimizations.
responsibilities: Develop full-stack web applications using MERN stack
Optimize database queries and application performance
Write comprehensive unit and integration tests
achievements: Improved system performance by 40% through database and code optimizations
Developed 3 major client projects that generated $500K+ in revenue
Implemented automated testing pipeline reducing bugs by 60%
Created reusable component library used across multiple projects

title: Web Developer
description: Created responsive websites and web applications for various clients across different industries. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs and ensure cross-browser compatibility.
responsibilities: Develop responsive websites and web applications
Collaborate with designers to implement UI/UX designs
Optimize websites for search engines and performance
Maintain and update existing client websites
Provide technical support and training to clients
achievements: Successfully delivered 20+ client projects on time and within budget
Improved average website load times by 50% through optimization techniques
Increased client retention rate by 30% through excellent support
Established best practices for responsive design across the agency
